Probabilistic treatment: 2018 recommendations (CNGOF - SPILF) recommend:

- Uncomplicated IGH: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 10 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 10 days


- Gonococcus: Ceftriaxone (1 g/d, IV, 14 days).

- Chlamydia: Doxycycline (100 mg/12 hours, "per os" or IV, 14 days).

question.question: What is the recommended treatment for uncomplicated IGH (upper genital infection) in women?
question.option_a: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 7 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 5 days
question.option_b: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 10 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 10 days
question.option_c: Ceftriaxone (1 g/d, IV, 7 days) + Doxycycline (100 mg/12 hours, "per os" or IV, 5 days)
question.option_d: Ceftriaxone 1g IV/IM single dose + Doxycycline 100mg/12h po 5 days + Metronidazole 500mg/12h po 7 days
